code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{getBooks}from'../utils/api';import BookCard from'../components/BookCard';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Books=()=>{const[books,setBooks]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchBooks=async()=>{try{const data=await getBooks();setBooks(data);}catch(err){console.error('Error fetching books:',err);setError('Failed to load books.');}};fetchBooks();},[]);if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{color:'red',padding:'20px'},children:error});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"All Books"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form-group",style:{marginBottom:'20px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search books...",style:{maxWidth:'300px'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid",children:books.length>0?books.map(book=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BookCard,{book:book},book.id)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No books available."})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{textAlign:'center',color:'#4b5563'},children:["Showing 1-",books.length," of ",books.length," books.
